hero.label: Manufacturing
hero.title: High-quality outsourced manufacturing
hero.subtitle: Efficient production with the highest quality standards.

pitch.text: At YOBEL we offer outsourced manufacturing services that allow you to focus on your core business. Our plants meet the highest quality standards and international certifications.

items.title: Product Assembly
items.desc: Production of goods according to your specifications with rigorous quality control.

items.title: Assembly
items.desc: Assembly of products and components with precision and efficiency.

items.title: Conditioning
items.desc: Preparation and customization of products for different markets.

items.title: Quality Control
items.desc: Inspection and validation of products according to international standards.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Optimize your production with our manufacturing solutions.
items: Flexibility to scale according to demand.
Integration with storage and distribution services.

processes.subtitle: From idea to product
processes.title: Our manufacturing processes guarantee quality, efficiency and compliance at every stage.
processes.label: Processes

items.title: Planning
items.desc: Definition of requirements, materials and production schedules.

items.title: Production
items.desc: Execution of the production process with in-line controls.

items.title: Quality Control
items.desc: Inspection and validation of finished products.

items.title: Delivery
items.desc: Dispatch of products to warehouse or directly to distribution.

items.question: What certifications do your plants have?
items.answer: We have ISO 9001, GMP, and other certifications depending on the industry.

items.question: What is the minimum production capacity?
items.answer: We adapt to different volumes, from small batches to mass production.

items.question: Can you handle special raw materials?
items.answer: Yes, we have experience in handling various types of materials and components.

items.question: Do you offer R&D services?
items.answer: Yes, we can support the development of new products and process improvement.
